alert.note: Alert for St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 1:19AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL IBERIA... NORTHWESTERN ST. MARTIN AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 200 AM CST... At 119 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Catahoula, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Catahoula, Henderson, Loreauville, Butte La Rose, Cecilia, Atchafalaya Welcome Center, Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge, and Parks. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 113 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin
